name: Sly Panda
description:
Introduction

Slow down time, fire off tons of bullets and defeat dopey ghosts. That is what Sly Panda is all about!

- That is what you get for destroying their precious urn ...

Controls

Keyboard
Arrow keys, Z and X, P for pause

Controller
D-pad / Joystick,  A/B or X/Y, Start for pause

Credits

- Sebastian Lind
